valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 12 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 13 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low 300 miles southwest of Iceland 940 expected just south of Iceland 960 by 1800 Friday. New low expected Trafalgar 1007 by same time

Trafalgar.text:
Wind
Cyclonic, 3 to 5 at first in southeast, otherwise 6 to gale 8, perhaps severe gale 9 later.
Sea state
Moderate at first in southeast, otherwise rough or very rough, becoming very rough or high in northwest and later elsewhere.
Weather
Rain or thundery showers.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally poor.

FitzRoy.text:

Weather
In south, rain then showers. In north, showers.
Visibility
In south, good, occasionally poor. In north, moderate or poor.
